channel.title: Hugo on One Problem Solved
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on One Problem Solved

item.title: Hugo Setup
item.description: My Hugo Setup Here’s how I set up this site using the Hugo static site generator. Themes There’s many available themes. I used the Mainroad theme, but I changed the colors. Composing Posts To add a post, you just add a new markdown file with the correct metadata section at the top, and then run Hugo again to generate your static site. Here’s an example of what an actual posts look like written in markdown.

item.title: Hugo Commands
item.description: My Commonly-Used Hugo Commands Command Description hugo new post/my-post.md Create a new post hugo server Start hugo server hugo server -D Start hugo server and include draft posts hugo Build site for publishing
